name: poison-heal

effect.x-y: Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.

short_effect: Heals for 1/8 max HP after each turn when poisoned in place of damage.

flavor_text.x-y: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.
